TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionMethodItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示衍生自的類別中的方法相關聯的智慧標籤面板項目。

span.span: Represents a smart tag panel item that is associated with a method in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表智慧標籤面板中的個別項目。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 此型別的項目會顯示為作用中的使用者介面項目，例如超連結，可叫用的程式設計人員提供的方法從衍生類別中。An item of this type is displayed as an active user interface element, such as a hyperlink, that invokes a programmer-supplied method in a class derived from . 項目和方法之間的關聯會維護的值透過屬性。The association between the item and the method is maintained through the value of the property. 此項目叫用之方法必須不採用參數和傳回值。The method that this item invokes must neither take parameters nor return a value. 個別的控制台項目會一起以形成一個面板，藉由呼叫相關聯方法的類別。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to:將智慧標籤附加至 Windows Form 元件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`includeAsDesignerVerb`參數設定為`true`，則此項目也會被視為; 因此，它會新增至元件的設計階段的快顯功能表。If the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter is set to `true`, then this item is also considered a ; therefore, it will be added to the component's design-time shortcut menu. 在 Visual Studio 中，命令也會加入至**屬性**窗格的 [屬性] 視窗。In Visual Studio, a command will also be added to the **Attributes** pane of the Properties window. 設計工具動詞命令的清單可以透過設計工具的集合屬性。A list of designer verbs can be accessed through the designer's collection property. 建構函式並屬性，以`null`。The constructor sets the and properties to `null`.

summary.span: 以程式設計方式執行 與相關聯方法。

value.span: A ，其中包含相關聯的方法名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定哪一個屬性，在類別中衍生自類別，應該繫結至的項目。The property specifies which property, in the class derived from the class, that the item should be bound to. 當程式設計人員與透過使用者介面 (UI) 的控制台項目互動時，將會設定此關聯的屬性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 繫結的方法應該不會採用參數和傳回值。The bound method should neither take parameters nor return a value. 這個屬性是設定於建構函式中。This property is set in the constructor. 它會區分大小寫。It is case-sensitive.

related.span: Windows Form 的設計工具命令和 DesignerAction 物件模型

summary.span: 取得或設定元件，以便共同完成其給目前的面板物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its objects to the current panel.

value.span: 參與元件，應該有關聯的設計工具，提供項目。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓另一個元件來強化其智慧標籤面板項目至目前的清單。The property allows another component to lend its smart tag panel items to the current list. 例如，使用者控制項可能會從其組成的標準控制項的其中一個彙總項目。For example, a user control might aggregate the items from one of its constituent standard controls. 此屬性可搭配屬性。This property works in conjunction with the property.

related.span: Windows Form 的設計工具命令和 DesignerAction 物件模型

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms
